instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00165 chime noise non stop
threads.message:
The MacBook turn on the backlight then gives the sound of chime noise, after it, it enters on infinity loop of this sound, anyone knows what is the problem and can it be fixed?
(tried to change this bios of this is motherboard but always the same problem)

threads.title: 820-00165 chime noise non stop
threads.message:
What happens if you disconnect trackpad flex?
In fact, disconnect battery too.
Machine should automatically start, when connect the charger.

threads.title: 820-00165 chime noise non stop
threads.message: when disconnecting all it stuck on a black screen, but when i connect IO flex it + battery (need it to turn on this version) it's stuck on the same problem(the infinity loop sound)

threads.title: 820-00165 chime noise non stop
threads.message:
I said trackpad flex and battery.
If you disconnect LIO flex, no sound available...

threads.title: 820-00165 chime noise non stop
threads.message: When i plug the lio flex it requires battery to turn on

threads.title: 820-00165 chime noise non stop
threads.message: Yes and i can hear the sound and still have the same problem

threads.title: 820-00165 chime noise non stop
threads.message:
i cleaned ME region, it work for 1 time full boot on macOS, then the same problem again.
also tried an good BIOS. same problem...

threads.title: 820-00165 chime noise non stop
threads.message:
Something reacted to heat on the board.
Reball SMC now.

threads.title: 820-00165 chime noise non stop
threads.message: after reballing SMC it stuck on boot loading( was half loaded) then it turned off, i tired to change SSD and boot from another external disk but always stuck,then tried to do SMC and PRAM reset, then its back to the main problem( infinity loop of chime sound
